     \-H "X-User-Token: ${USER\_TOKEN}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Email: ${USER\_EMAIL}" \\
     \-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \\
     "https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/supplier\_classifications"

## [](#tag/supplier_classifications/operation/Create a Supplier Classification)Create a Supplier Classification

Create a supplier classifications with given attributes, relationships, and related complex resources.

```json
{
  "data": {
    "type": "supplier_classifications",
    "attributes": {
      "name": "Classification 1",
      "order": 1,
      "country_alpha2": "CA",
      "codename": "diversity",
      "active": true,
      "external_id": "CLASSIFICATION-1",
      "request_additional_information": false
    }
  }
}
```

## Composite Resources

Resources that do not exist outside of parent resource, and are managed within the scope of parent resource, cannot be pre-created in advance. Supplier classifications have one composite resource `supplier_classification_fields` that includes another composite resource in itself - `supplier_classification_field_options`.

In order to create these resource along with the parent object, compound document must be used:

```json
{
  "data": {
    "type": "supplier_classifications",
    "attributes": {
      "name": "Classification 1",
      "order": 1,
      "country_alpha2": "CA",
      "codename": "diversity",
      "active": true,
      "external_id": "CLASSIFICATION-1",
      "request_additional_information": true
    },
    "relationships": {
      "supplier_classification_fields": {
        "data": [
          {
            "id": "CLASSIFICATION-FIELD-1",
            "type": "supplier_classification_fields"
          },
        ]
      }
    },
    "included": [
      {
        "id": "CLASSIFICATION-FIELD-1",
        "type": "supplier_classification_fields",
        "attributes": {
          "name": "Field 1",
          "order": 1,
          "required": false,
          "kind": "SELECT",
          "external_id": "CLASSIFICATION-FIELD-1"
        },
        "relationships": {
          "supplier_classification_field_options": {
            "data": [
              {
                "id": "CLASSIFICATION-FIELD-OPTION-1",
                "type": "supplier_classification_field_options"
              },
              {
                "id": "CLASSIFICATION-FIELD-OPTION-2",
                "type": "supplier_classification_field_options"
              }
            ]
          }
        }
      },
      {
        "id": "CLASSIFICATION-FIELD-OPTION-1",
        "type": "supplier_classification_field_options",
        "attributes": {
          "label": "Option 1",
          "order": 1,
          "external_id": "CLASSIFICATION-FIELD-OPTION-1"
        }
      },
      {
        "id": "CLASSIFICATION-FIELD-OPTION-2",
        "type": "supplier_classification_field_options",
        "attributes": {
          "label": "Option 2",
          "order": 2,
          "external_id": "CLASSIFICATION-FIELD-OPTION-2"
        }
      }
    ]
  }
}
```

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### query Parameters

include

string (SupplierClassificationRelatedResources)

Value: "supplier\_classification\_fields"

Use the `include` parameter to request related resources along with the primary resource.

##### Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json

data

object (SupplierClassification)

included

Array of SupplierClassificationField (object) or SupplierClassificationFieldOption (object) (SupplierClassificationIncludedMutationResources)

### Responses

**201**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

post/supplier\_classifications

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/supplier\_classifications

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/supplier\_classifications

### Request samples

-   Payload
-   Curl

Content type

application/vnd.api+json

Example

`{  -   "data": {          -   "type": "supplier_classifications",              -   "attributes": {                  -   "name": "SBE - Small Business Enterprise",                      -   "order": 1,                      -   "country_alpha2": "CA",                      -   "external_id": "SC-1",                      -   "codename": "diversity",                      -   "active": true,                      -   "request_additional_information": false                               }                   }       }`

## [](#tag/projects)Projects

Use the projects API to create, update, and query the projects in Workday Strategic Sourcing.

## [](#tag/projects/Project-Object)Project Object

type

required

string (ProjectType)

Object type, should always be `projects`.

id

required

integer (ProjectId)

attributes

object (ProjectAttributes)

Project attributes.

relationships

object (ProjectRelationship)

Project relationships.

links

object (ResourceLinks)

List of related links.

## [](#tag/projects/operation/List Projects)List Projects

Returns a list of projects for the specified criteria.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### query Parameters

filter

object (ProjectInputFilter)

Filter projects by multiple criteria. Only one filter per attribute is supported. For best performance, we recommend 5 or less filters.

page

object (PageInput)

Customize pagination results with `size`.

### Responses

**200**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

get/projects

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/projects

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/projects

### Request samples

-   Curl

Copy

curl \-H "X-Api-Key: ${COMPANY\_KEY}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Token: ${USER\_TOKEN}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Email: ${USER\_EMAIL}" \\
     \-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \\
     "https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/projects"

## [](#tag/projects/operation/Create a Project)Create a Project

Create a project with given attributes.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json

data

object (ProjectCreate)

### Responses

**201**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

post/projects

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/projects

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/projects

## [](#tag/projects/operation/Get a Project)Get a Project

Retrieves the details of an existing project. You need to supply the unique project identifier that was returned upon project creation.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

id

required

integer

Example: 1

Unique Project identifier.

### Responses

**200**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

**404**

Not Found

get/projects/{id}

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/projects/{id}

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/projects/{id}

### Request samples

-   Curl

Copy

curl \-H "X-Api-Key: ${COMPANY\_KEY}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Token: ${USER\_TOKEN}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Email: ${USER\_EMAIL}" \\
     \-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \\
     "https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/projects/1"

### Response samples

-   200

Content type

application/vnd.api+json

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "data": {          -   "type": "projects",              -   "id": "1",              -   "attributes": {                  -   "actual_end_date": "2031-12-30",                      -   "actual_savings_amount": 12.23,                      - ## [](#tag/projects/operation/Update a Project)Update a Project

Updates the details of an existing project. You need to supply the unique supplier project that was returned upon project creation.

Please note, that request body must include an `id` attribute with the value of your project unique identifier (the same one you passed in the URL).

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

id

required

integer

Example: 1

Unique Project identifier.

##### Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json

data

object (ProjectUpdate)

### Responses

**200**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

**404**

Not Found

**409**

Conflict

patch/projects/{id}

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/projects/{id}

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/projects/{id}

### Request samples

-   Payload
-   Curl

Content type

application/vnd.api+json

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "data": {          -   "type": "projects",              -   "id": "1",              -   "attributes": {                  -   "actual_end_date": "2031-12-30",                      -   "actual_savings_amount": "212.23",                      -   "actual_spend_amount": "223.45",                      -   "approved_spend_amount": "255.55",                      -   "actual_start_date": "2019-01-20",                      -   "canceled_note": null,                      -   "canceled_reason": null,                      -   "description": "Project Description Updated",                      -   "estimated_savings_amount": "211.33",                      -   "estimated_spend_amount": "221.12",                      -   "external_id": "1234-5678-abcd-efgh",                      -   "needs_attention": false,                      -   "needs_attention_note": null,                      -   "needs_attention_reason": null,                      -   "on_hold_note": null,                      -   "on_hold_reason": null,                      -   "project_type_id": "3",                      -   "spend_category_id": "2",                      -   "state": "active",                      -   "state_label": "Sourcing",                      -   "target_end_date": "2032-12-31",                      -   "target_start_date": "2019-01-15",                      -   "title": "Project Title Updated",                      -   "custom_fields": [                          -   {                                  -   "name": "Custom Field Currency",                                      -   "value": 987654321                                                       },                              - -   200
-   409

application/vnd.api+json

Copy

## [](#tag/projects/operation/Delete a Project)Delete a Project

Deletes a project. You need to supply the unique project identifier that was returned upon project creation.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

id

required

integer

Example: 1

Unique Project identifier.

### Responses

**204**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

**404**

Not Found

delete/projects/{id}

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/projects/{id}

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/projects/{id}

### Request samples

-   Curl

Copy

curl \-H "X-Api-Key: ${COMPANY\_KEY}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Token: ${USER\_TOKEN}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Email: ${USER\_EMAIL}" \\
     \-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \\
     \-X DELETE \\
     "https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/projects/1"

required

string

OK

**401**

## [](#tag/projects/operation/Update a Project by External ID)Update a Project by External ID

Updates the details of an existing project. You need to supply the unique project external identifier (the one you used when created the project).

Please note, that request body must include an `id` attribute with the value of your project external identifier (the same one you passed in the URL).

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

external\_id

required

string

Example: 1234-5678-abcd-efgh

Project external identifier.

##### Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json

data

object (ProjectUpdate)

### Responses

**200**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

**404**

Not Found

patch/projects/{external\_id}/external\_id

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/projects/{external\_id}/external\_id

  "attributes": {                          -   "name": "title",                              -   "data_type": "string",                              -   "scout_field_type": "Short Text",                              -   "custom_field": false                                           }                               },              -   {                  -   "id": "approved_at",                      -   "type": "project_fields",                      -   "attributes": {                          -   "name": "approved_at",                              -   "data_type": "string",                              -   "scout_field_type": "Date",                              -   "custom_field": false                                           }                               },              -   {                  -   "id": "project_type_id",                      -   "type": "project_fields",                      -   "attributes": {                          -   "name": "project_type_id",                              -   "data_type": "string",                              -   "scout_field_type": "Short Text",                              -   "custom_field": false                                           }                               },              -   {                  -   "id": "marked_as_needs_attention_at",                      -   "type": "project_fields",                      -   "attributes": {                          -   "name": "marked_as_needs_attention_at",                              -   "data_type": "string",                              -   "scout_field_type": "Date",                              -   "custom_field": false                                           }                               },              -   {                  -   "id": "needs_attention_note",                      -   "type": "project_fields",                      -   "attributes": {                          -   "name": "needs_attention_note",                              -   "data_type": "string",                              -   "scout_field_type": "Date",                              -   "custom_field": false                                           }                               },              -   {                  -   "id": "custom_field_1",                      -   "type": "project_fields",                      -   "attributes": {                          -   "name": "Custom field #1",                              -   "data_type": "string",                              -   "scout_field_type": "Short Text",                              -   "custom_field": true                                           }                               }                   ],      -   "links": { }       }`

## [](#tag/project_types)Project Types

Use the project types API to query the project types in Workday Strategic Sourcing.

Project Types are used in the project resource. On POST and PATCH related endpoints for this resource a project\_type\_id can be added to set the project type. The project\_type\_id is a foreign key for the project\_types resource's id.

## [](#tag/project_types/Project-Type-Object)Project Type Object

type

required

string (ProjectTypeType)

Object type, should always be `project_types`.

id

required

integer (ProjectTypeId)

Project type identifier string.

attributes

object (ProjectTypeAttributes)

Project type attributes.

links

object (ResourceLinks)

List of related links.

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "type": "project_types",      -   "id": 1,      -   "attributes": {          -   "name": "My Project Type",              -   "shortcode": "PRJA"                   },      -   "links": {          -   "self": "string"                   }       }`

## [](#tag/project_types/operation/List Project Types)List Project Types

Returns a list of all project types.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

### Responses

**200**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

get/project\_types

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/project\_types

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/project\_types

### Request samples

-   Curl

Copy

curl \-H "X-Api-Key: ${COMPANY\_KEY}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Token: ${USER\_TOKEN}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Email: ${USER\_EMAIL}" \\
     \-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \\
     "https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/project\_types"

### Response samples

-   200

Content type

application/vnd.api+json

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "meta": {          -   "count": 2                   },      -   "data": [          -   {                  -   "type": "project_types",                      -   "id": "1",                      -   "attributes": {                          -   "name": "Project Type #1",                              -   "shortcode": "PRJA"                                           },                      -   "links": {                          -   "self": "[https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/project_types/1](https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/project_types/1)"                                           }                               },              -   {                  -   "type": "project_types",                      -   "id": "2",                      -   "attributes": {                          -   "name": "Project Type #2",                              -   "shortcode": "PRJB"                                           },                      -   "links": {                          -   "self": "[https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/project_types/2](https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/project_types/2)"                                           }                               }                   ],      -   "links": {          -   "self": "[https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/project_types](https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/project_types)"                   }       }`

## [](#tag/project_types/operation/Get a Project Type)Get a Project Type

Retrieves the details of an existing project type.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

id

required

integer

Example: 1

Unique project type identifier.

### Responses

**200**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

**404**

Not Found

get/project\_types/{id}

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/project\_types/{id}

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/project\_types/{id}

### Request samples

-   Curl

Copy

curl \-H "X-Api-Key: ${COMPANY\_KEY}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Token: ${USER\_TOKEN}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Email: ${USER\_EMAIL}" \\
     \-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \\
     "https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/project\_types/1"

### Response samples

-   200

Content type

application/vnd.api+json

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "data": {          -   "type": "project_types",              -   "id": "1",              -   "attributes": {                  -   "name": "The Project Type",                      -   "shortcode": "PRJT"                               },              -   "links": {                  -   "self": "[https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/project_types/1](https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/project_types/1)"                               }                   }       }`

## [](#tag/project_supplier_companies)Project Supplier Companies

Use the project supplier companies API to manage project suppliers.

## [](#tag/project_supplier_companies/operation/Add Suppliers)Add Suppliers

Add suppliers to a project.

For best performance, we recommend inviting 10 or less suppliers in a single request.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

project\_id

required

integer

Example: 1

Project identifier.

##### Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json

data

Array of objects (SupplierCompany)

### Responses

**204**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

**404**

Not Found

post/projects/{project\_id}/relationships/supplier\_companies

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/projects/{project\_id}/relationships/supplier\_companies

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/projects/{project\_id}/relationships/supplier\_companies

### Request samples

-   Payload
-   Curl

Content type

application/vnd.api+json

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "data": [          -   {                  -   "type": "supplier_companies",                      -   "id": "5"                               },              -   {                  -   "type": "supplier_companies",                      -   "id": "11"                               }                   ]       }`

## [](#tag/project_supplier_companies/operation/Remove Suppliers)Remove Suppliers

Remove suppliers from a project.

For best performance, we recommend removing 10 or less suppliers in a single request.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

project\_id

required

integer

Example: 1

Project identifier.

##### Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json

### Responses

**401**

Unauthorized

**404**

Sandbox Server

## [](#tag/project_supplier_companies/operation/Add Suppliers using External IDs)Add Suppliers using External IDs

Add suppliers to a project.

You must supply the unique project external identifier (the one you used when created the project).

You must supply the external identifiers of the supplier companies too.

For best performance, we recommend inviting 10 or less suppliers in a single request.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

project\_external\_id

required

string

Example: PRJ1

Project external identifier.

##### Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json

data

Array of objects (ExternalSupplierCompany)

### Responses

**204**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

**404**

Not Found

post/projects/{project\_external\_id}/relationships/supplier\_companies/external\_id

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/projects/{project\_external\_id}/relationships/supplier\_companies/external\_id

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/projects/{project\_external\_id}/relationships/supplier\_companies/external\_id

### Request samples

-   Payload
-   Curl

Content type

application/vnd.api+json

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "data": [          -   {                  -   "type": "supplier_companies",                      -   "id": "SUP5"                               },              -   {                  -   "type": "supplier_companies",                      -   "id": "SUP11"                               }                   ]       }`

## [](#tag/project_supplier_contacts)Project Supplier Contacts

Use the project supplier contacts API to manage project suppliers. This API provides 2 advantages over the project supplier companies APIs:

-   It allows specifying the supplier contact to be associated/removed from a project.
-   It allows specifying multiple contacts for a given supplier.

## [](#tag/project_supplier_contacts/operation/Add Suppliers using Contacts)Add Suppliers using Contacts

Add suppliers to a project using supplier contacts.

For best performance, we recommend inviting 10 or less supplier contacts in a single request.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

project\_id

required

integer

Example: 1

Project identifier.

##### Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json

data

Array of objects (SupplierContact)

### Responses

**204**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

**404**

Not Found

post/projects/{project\_id}/relationships/supplier\_contacts

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/projects/{project\_id}/relationships/supplier\_contacts

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/projects/{project\_id}/relationships/supplier\_contacts

### Request samples

-   Payload
-   Curl

Content type

application/vnd.api+json

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "data": [          -   {                  -   "type": "supplier_contacts",                      -   "id": "10"                               },              -   {                  -   "type": "supplier_contacts",                      -   "id": "17"                               }                   ]       }`

## [](#tag/contracts)Contracts

Use the contracts API to create, update, and query the contracts in Workday Strategic Sourcing.

## [](#tag/contracts/Contract-Object)Contract Object

type

required

string (ContractTypeValue)

Object type, should always be `contracts`.

id

required

integer (ContractId)

Contract identifier string.

attributes

object

Contract attributes.

relationships

object (ContractRelationship)

Contract relationship.

links

object (ResourceLinks)

List of related links.

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "data": {          -   "type": "contracts",              -   "id": "1",              -   "attributes": {                  -   "actual_end_date": "2031-12-30",                      -   "actual_spend_amount": 11.11,                      -   "po_amount": 22.22,                      -   "invoiced_po_amount": 33.33,                      -   "non_po_invoiced_amount": 44.44,                      -   "total_invoiced_amount": 77.77,                      -   "actual_start_date": "2028-12-30",                      -   "auto_renewal": "yes",                      -   "approved_at": "2019-10-11T09:12:31.080Z",                      -   "approval_rounds": 1,                      -   "contract_type_id": "3",                      -   "description": "Contract Description",                      -   "external_id": "1234-5678-abcd-efgh",                      -   "marked_as_needs_attention_at": null,                      -   "needs_attention": false,                      -   "needs_attention_note": null,                      -   "needs_attention_reason": null,                      -   "number": 1,                      -   "renew_number_of_times": 3,                      -   "renewal_term_unit": "days",                      -   "renewal_term_value": 4,                      -   "renewal_termination_notice_date": "2031-07-30",                      -   "renewal_termination_notice_unit": "months",                      -   "renewal_termination_notice_value": 5,                      -   "renewal_termination_reminder_date": "2031-06-18",                      -   "renewal_termination_reminder_unit": "weeks",                      -   "renewal_termination_reminder_value": 6,                      -   "first_sent_for_approval_at": "2019-10-05T05:24:12.000Z",                      -   "sent_for_approval_at": "2019-10-05T05:24:12.000Z",                      -   "spend_category_id": "2",                      -   "state": "in_progress",                      -   "state_label": "Discovery",                      -   "terminated_note": null,                      -   "terminated_reason": null,                      -   "title": "Contract Title",                      -   "updated_at": "2019-10-29T21:28:46.790Z",                      -   "scc_updated_at": "2019-10-29T21:28:46.790Z",                      -   "request_submitted_at": "2019-10-29T21:28:46.790Z",                      -   "request_opened_at": null,                      -   "custom_fields": [                          -   {                                  -   "name": "Custom Field Currency",                                      -   "value": 1234567890                                                       },                              -   {                                  -   "name": "Custom Field Decimal",                                      -   "value": 123456.78                                                       },                              -   {                                  -   "name": "Custom Field Date",                                      -   "value": "2018-12-31T00:00:00.000Z"                                                       },                              -   {                                  -   "name": "Custom Field Select",                                      -   "value": "Select Option"                                                       },                              -   {                                  -   "name": "Custom Field Multiple",                                      -   "value": [                                          -   "Multiple Select Option 1",                                              -   "Multiple Select Option 2"                                                                   ]                                                       },                              -   {                                  -   "name": "Custom Field Short Text",                                      -   "value": "some short text"                                                       },                              -   {                                  -   "name": "Custom Field Paragraph",                                      -   "value": "longer text than short text"                                                       },                              -   {                                  -   "name": "Custom Field URL",                                      -   "value": "[http://www.example.com](http://www.example.com)"                                                       }                                           ]                               },              -   "relationships": {                  -   "attachments": {                          -   "data": [                                  -   {                                          -   "id": "1",                                              -   "type": "attachments"                                                                   },                                      -   {                                          -   "id": "2",                                              -   "type": "attachments"                                                                   }                                                       ]                                           },                      -   "supplier_company": {                          -   "data": {                                  -   "id": "1",                                      -   "type": "supplier_companies"                                                       }                                           },                      - Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "type": "adobe_sign_documents",      -   "id": 1,      -   "attributes": {          -   "name": "Document #236",              -   "adobe_id": "24"                   },      -   "relationships": {          -   "attachment": {                  -   "type": "attachments",                      -   "id": 1                               }                   }       }`

## [](#tag/contracts/operation/List Contracts)List Contracts

Returns a list of contracts for the specified criteria.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### query Parameters

filter

object (ContractInputFilter)

Filter contracts by multiple criteria. Only one filter per attribute is supported. For best performance, we recommend 5 or less filters.

include

string (ContractRelatedResources)

Enum: "attachments" "contract\_type" "supplier\_company" "docusign\_envelopes" "adobe\_sign\_agreements"

To reduce the number of HTTP requests, related resources can be requested along with the requested primary resources. Such responses are called "compound documents". In a compound document, all included resources will be represented as an array of resource objects in a top-level `included` member.

The value of the `include` parameter must be a comma-separated list of relationships from the list of available relationships.

```
/contracts?include=contract_type,supplier_company
```

In the response, relationships will be represented as normal linkage objects (containing `id` and `type`), and full related resource details will be presented in the `included` section as resource objects (with `attributes`, `links`, and potentially `relationships`).

page

object (PageInput)

Customize pagination results with `size`.

### Responses

**200**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

get/contracts

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contracts

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/contracts

### Request samples

-   Curl

Copy

curl \-H "X-Api-Key: ${COMPANY\_KEY}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Token: ${USER\_TOKEN}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Email: ${USER\_EMAIL}" \\
     \-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \\
     "https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contracts"

### Response samples

-   200

Content type

application/vnd.api+json

object (ContractCreate)

## [](#tag/contracts/operation/Get a Contract)Get a Contract

Retrieves the details of an existing contract. You need to supply the unique contract identifier that was returned upon contract creation.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

id

required

integer

Example: 1

Unique Contract identifier.

##### query Parameters

include

string (ContractRelatedResources)

Enum: "attachments" "contract\_type" "supplier\_company" "docusign\_envelopes" "adobe\_sign\_agreements"

Use the `include` parameter to request related resources along with the primary resource.

### Responses

**200**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

**404**

Not Found

get/contracts/{id}

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contracts/{id}

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/contracts/{id}

### Request samples

-   Curl

Copy

curl \-H "X-Api-Key: ${COMPANY\_KEY}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Token: ${USER\_TOKEN}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Email: ${USER\_EMAIL}" \\
     \-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \\
     "https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contracts/1"

### Response samples

-   200

Content type

application/vnd.api+json

Example

simple\_requestcompound\_requestsimple\_request

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

  {                                  -   "name": "Custom Field Multiple",                                      -   "value": [                                          -   "Multiple Select Option 1",                                              -   "Multiple Select Option 2"                                                                   ]                                                       },                              -   {                                  -   "name": "Custom Field Short Text",                                      -   "value": "some short text"                                                       },                              -   {                                  -   "name": "Custom Field Paragraph",                                      -   "value": "longer text than short text"                                                       },                              -   {                                  -   "name": "Custom Field URL",                                      -   "value": "[http://www.example.com](http://www.example.com)"                                                       }                                           ]                               },              -   "relationships": {                  -   "attachments": {                          -   "data": [                                  -   {                                          -   "id": "1",                                              -   "type": "attachments"                                                                   },                                      -   {                                          -   "id": "2",                                              -   "type": "attachments"                                                                   }                                                       ]                                           },                      -   "supplier_company": {                          -   "data": {                                  -   "id": "1",                                      -   "type": "supplier_companies"                                                       }                                           },                      -   "creator": {                          -   "data": {                                  -   "id": "1",                                      -   "type": "stakeholders"                                                       }                                           },                      -   "owner": {                          -   "data": {                                  -   "id": "1",                                      -   "type": "stakeholders"                                                       }                                           },                      -   "contract_type": {                          -   "data": {                                  -   "id": "3",                                      -   "type": "contract_types"                                                       }                                           },                      -   "docusign_envelopes": {                          -   "data": [                                  -   {                                          -   "id": "3",                                              -   "type": "docusign_envelopes"                                                                   }                                                       ]                                           },                      -   "adobe_sign_agreements": {                          -   "data": [                                  -   {                                          -   "id": "4",                                              -   "type": "adobe_sign_agreements"                                                                   }                                                       ]                                           }                               },              -   "links": {                  -   "self": "[https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contracts/1](https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contracts/1)"                               }                   }       }`

## [](#tag/contracts/operation/Update a Contract)Update a Contract

Updates the details of an existing contract. You need to supply the unique supplier contract that was returned upon contract creation.

Please note, that request body must include an `id` attribute with the value of your contract unique identifier (the same one you passed in the URL).

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

id

required

integer

Example: 1

Unique Contract identifier.

##### Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json

data

object (ContractUpdate)

### Responses

**200**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

**404**

Not Found

**409**

Conflict

patch/contracts/{id}

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contracts/{id}

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/contracts/{id}

### Request samples

-   Payload
-   Curl

Content type

application/vnd.api+json

Example

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

## [](#tag/contracts/operation/Delete a Contract)Delete a Contract

Deletes a contract. You need to supply the unique contract identifier that was returned upon contract creation.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

id

required

integer

Example: 1

Unique Contract identifier.

### Responses

**204**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

**404**

Not Found

delete/contracts/{id}

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contracts/{id}

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/contracts/{id}

### Request samples

-   Curl

Copy

curl \-H "X-Api-Key: ${COMPANY\_KEY}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Token: ${USER\_TOKEN}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Email: ${USER\_EMAIL}" \\
     \-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \\
     \-X DELETE \\
     "https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contracts/1"

## [](#tag/contracts/operation/Get a Contract by External ID)Get a Contract by External ID

Retrieves the details of an existing contract. You need to supply the unique contract external identifier (the one you used when created the contract).

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

external\_id

required

string

Example: 1234-5678-abcd-efgh

Contract external identifier.

##### query Parameters

include

string (ContractRelatedResources)

Enum: "attachments" "contract\_type" "supplier\_company" "docusign\_envelopes" "adobe\_sign\_agreements"

Use the `include` parameter to request related resources along with the primary resource.

### Responses

**200**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

**404**

Not Found

get/contracts/{external\_id}/external\_id

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contracts/{external\_id}/external\_id

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/contracts/{external\_id}/external\_id

### Request samples

-   Curl

Copy

curl \-H "X-Api-Key: ${COMPANY\_KEY}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Token: ${USER\_TOKEN}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Email: ${USER\_EMAIL}" \\
     \-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \\
     "https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contracts/SUP-1234/external\_id"

  {                                  -   "name": "Custom Field Paragraph",                                      -   "value": "longer text than short text updated"                                                       },                              -   {                                  -   "name": "Custom Field URL",                                      -   "value": "[http://www.example.com/updated](http://www.example.com/updated)"                                                       }                                           ]                               },              -   "relationships": {                  -   "attachments": {                          -   "data": [                                  -   {                                          -   "id": "1",                                              -   "type": "attachments"                                                                   },                                      -   {                                          -   "id": "2",                                              -   "type": "attachments"                                                                   }                                                       ]                                           },                      -   "supplier_company": {                          -   "data": {                                  -   "id": "1",                                      -   "type": "supplier_companies"                                                       }                                           },                      -   "creator": {                          -   "data": {                                  -   "id": "1",                                      -   "type": "stakeholders"                                                       }                                           },                      -   "owner": {                          -   "data": {                                  -   "id": "2",                                      -   "type": "stakeholders"                                                       }                                           },                      -   "contract_type": {                          -   "data": {                                  -   "id": "3",                                      -   "type": "contract_types"                                                       }                                           },                      -   "docusign_envelopes": {                          -   "data": [ ]                                           },                      -   "adobe_sign_agreements": {                          -   "data": [ ]                                           }                               },              -   "links": {                  -   "self": "[https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contracts/1](https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contracts/1)"                               }                   }       }`

## [](#tag/contracts/operation/Delete a Contract by External ID)Delete a Contract by External ID

Deletes a contract. You need to supply the unique contract external identifier (the one you used when created the contract).

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

external\_id

required

string

Example: 1234-5678-abcd-efgh

Contract external identifier.

### Responses

**204**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

**404**

Not Found

delete/contracts/{external\_id}/external\_id

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contracts/{external\_id}/external\_id

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/contracts/{external\_id}/external\_id

### Request samples

-   Curl

Copy

curl \-H "X-Api-Key: ${COMPANY\_KEY}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Token: ${USER\_TOKEN}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Email: ${USER\_EMAIL}" \\
     \-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \\
     \-X DELETE \\
     "https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contracts/SUP-1234/external\_id"

## [](#tag/contract_types)Contract Types

Use the contract types API to query the contract types in Workday Strategic Sourcing.

Contract Types are used in the contract resource. On POST and PATCH related endpoints for this resource a contract\_type\_id can be added to set the contract type. The contract\_type\_id is a foreign key for the contract\_types resource's id.

## [](#tag/contract_types/Contract-Type-Object)Contract Type Object

type

required

string (ContractTypeType)

Object type, should always be `contract_types`.

id

required

integer (ContractTypeId)

Contract type identifier string.

attributes

object (ContractTypeAttributes)

Contract type attributes.

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "type": "contract_types",      -   "id": 1,      -   "attributes": {          -   "name": "My Contract Type",              -   "shortcode": "CPUB",              -   "external_id": "1234-5678-abcd-efgh"                   }       }`

## [](#tag/contract_types/operation/List Contract Types)List Contract Types

Returns a list of all contract types.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

### Responses

**200**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

get/contract\_types

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contract\_types

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/contract\_types

### Request samples

-   Curl

Copy

curl \-H "X-Api-Key: ${COMPANY\_KEY}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Token: ${USER\_TOKEN}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Email: ${USER\_EMAIL}" \\
     \-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \\
     "https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contract\_types"

### Response samples

-   200

Content type

application/vnd.api+json

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "meta": {          -   "count": 2                   },      -   "data": [          -   {                  -   "type": "contract_types",                      -   "id": "1",                      -   "attributes": {                          -   "name": "Contract Type #1",                              -   "shortcode": "CTRA",                              -   "external_id": "CTR$1"                                           },                      -   "links": {                          -   "self": "[https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contract_types/1](https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contract_types/1)"                                           }                               },              -   {                  -   "type": "contract_types",                      -   "id": "2",                      -   "attributes": {                          -   "name": "Contract Type #2",                              -   "shortcode": "CTRB",                              -   "external_id": "CTR$2"                                           },                      -   "links": {                          -   "self": "[https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contract_types/2](https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contract_types/2)"                                           }                               }                   ],      -   "links": {          -   "self": "[https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contract_types](https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contract_types)"                   }       }`

## [](#tag/contract_types/operation/Update a Contract Type)Update a Contract Type

Updates the details of an existing contract type. You need to supply the unique identifier that was returned upon contract type creation.

Please note, that request body must include an `id` attribute with the value of your contract type unique identifier (the same one you passed in the URL).

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

id

required

integer

Example: 1

Unique contract type identifier.

##### Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json

data

object (ContractTypeUpdate)

### Responses

**200**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

**404**

Not Found

**409**

Conflict

patch/contract\_types/{id}

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contract\_types/{id}

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/contract\_types/{id}

### Request samples

-   Payload
-   Curl

Content type

application/vnd.api+json

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "data": {          -   "id": "1",              -   "type": "contract_types",              -   "attributes": {                  -   "name": "Updated Contract Type",                      -   "shortcode": "C1",                      -   "external_id": "C$1"                               }                   }       }`

### Response samples

-   200
-   409

Content type

application/vnd.api+json

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "data": {          -   "id": "1",              -   "type": "contract_types",              -   "attributes": {                  -   "name": "Updated Contract Type",                      -   "shortcode": "C1",                      -   "external_id": "C$1"                               },              -   "links": {                  -   "self": "[https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contract_types/1](https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contract_types/1)"                               }                   }       }`

## [](#tag/contract_types/operation/Update a Contract Type by External ID)Update a Contract Type by External ID

Updates the details of an existing contract type. You need to supply the unique external identifier assigned to the contract type on creation.

Please note, that request body must include an `id` attribute with the value of your contract type unique identifier (the same one you passed in the URL).

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

external\_id

required

string

Example: CTR$1

Unique contract type external identifier.

##### Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json

data

object (ContractTypeUpdate)

### Responses

**200**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

**404**

Not Found

patch/contract\_types/{external\_id}/external\_id

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/contract\_types/{external\_id}/external\_id

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/contract\_types/{external\_id}/external\_id

### Request samples

-   Payload

## [](#tag/events)Events

Use the events API to create, update, and query the events in Workday Strategic Sourcing.

## [](#tag/events/Event-Object)Event Object

type

required

string (EventType)

Object type, should always be `events`.

id

required

integer (EventId)

Event identifier string.

attributes

object (EventAttributes)

Event attributes.

relationships

object (EventRelationship)

Event relationships.

links

object (ResourceLinks)

List of related links.

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "id": "1",      -   "type": "events",      -   "attributes": {          -   "title": "Event Title",              -   "spend_amount": 500,              -   "supplier_rsvp_deadline": "2020-03-30T19:00:00.000Z",              -   "supplier_question_deadline": "2020-04-30T19:00:00.000Z",              -   "bid_submission_deadline": "2020-05-30T19:00:00.000Z",              -   "event_type": "RFP",              -   "state": "closed",              -   "duplication_state": "finished",              -   "request_type": "RFP",              -   "late_bids": true,              -   "revise_bids": false,              -   "instant_notifications": false,              -   "spend_category_id": "1",              -   "updated_at": "2020-03-17T02:36:31.276Z",              -   "closed_at": "2020-03-16T02:36:31.276Z",              -   "external_id": "EVENT1",              -   "custom_fields": [                  -   {                          -   "name": "Field #0",                              -   "value": "Field value"                                           }                               ]                   },      -   "relationships": {          -   "attachments": {                  -   "data": [                          -   {                                  -   "id": "1",                                      -   "type": "attachments"                                                       }                                           ]                               },              -   "event_template": {                  -   "data": {                          -   "id": "1",                              -   "type": "event_templates"                                           }                               },              - ## [](#tag/events/operation/List Events)List Events

Returns a list of events for the specified criteria.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### query Parameters

filter

object (EventInputFilter)

Filter events by multiple criteria. Only one filter per attribute is supported. For best performance, we recommend 5 or less filters.

page

object (PageInput)

Customize pagination results with `size`.

OK

**401**

## [](#tag/events/operation/Create an Event)Create an Event

Events can only be created from a template. When a creation request is issued, the base event object will be created from the template and returned with the response. Child records such as attachments, price sheets, custom values, will be scheduled for copy asynchronously. Current duplication status can be retrieved from the `duplication_state` attribute, which will have one of following values:

-   `scheduled` - duplication is scheduled, but not yet started;
-   `started` - duplication started, but not yet finished;
-   `finished` - duplication completed;
-   `failed` - there was an error duplicating relationships.

An event should always have an associated project, please make sure to specify it as always relationship object.

Please note, this endpoint does not support auction creation/duplication.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json

data

object (EventCreate)

### Responses

**201**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

**422**

Unprocessable Entity

post/events

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/events

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/events

### Request samples

-   Payload
-   Curl

Content type

application/vnd.api+json

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "data": {          -   "type": "events",              -   "attributes": {                  -   "duplicate_bids": true,                      -   "external_id": "EVENT1"                               },              -   "relationships": {                  -   "event_template": {                          -   "data": {                                  -   "id": "1",                                      -   "type": "event_templates"                                                       }                                           },                      -   "project": {                          -   "data": {                                  -   "id": "1",                                      -   "type": "projects"                                                       }                                           }                               }                   }       }`

### Response samples

-   201
-   422

  "supplier_rsvp_deadline": "2020-03-30T19:00:00.000Z",                      -   "supplier_question_deadline": "2020-04-30T19:00:00.000Z",                      -   "bid_submission_deadline": "2020-05-30T19:00:00.000Z",                      -   "event_type": "RFP",                      -   "state": "draft",                      -   "request_type": "RFP",                      -   "late_bids": true,                      -   "revise_bids": true,                      -   "instant_notifications": true,                      -   "custom_fields": [ ],                      -   "spend_category_id": "1",                      -   "updated_at": "2020-03-17T02:36:31.276Z",                      -   "attachments": {                          -   "data": [ ]                                           },                      -   "event_template": {                          -   "data": {                                  -   {                  -   "id": "supplier_question_deadline",                      -   "type": "event_fields",                      -   "attributes": {                          -   "name": "supplier_question_deadline",                              -   "data_type": "string",                              -   "scout_field_type": "Date",                              -   "custom_field": false                                           }                               },              -   {                  -   "id": "bid_submission_deadline",                      -   "type": "event_fields",                      -   "attributes": {                          -   "name": "bid_submission_deadline",                              -   "data_type": "string",                              -   "scout_field_type": "Date",                              -   "custom_field": false                                           }                               },              -   {                  -   "id": "spend_category_id",                      -   "type": "event_fields",                      -   "attributes": {                          -   "name": "spend_category_id",                              -   "data_type": "integer",                              -   "scout_field_type": "Integer",                              -   "custom_field": false                                           }                               },              -   {                  -   "id": "updated_at",                      -   "type": "event_fields",                      -   "attributes": {                          -   "name": "updated_at",                              -   "data_type": "string",                              -   "scout_field_type": "Date",                              -   "custom_field": false                                           }                               },              -   {                  -   "id": "closed_at",                      -   "type": "event_fields",                      -   "attributes": {                          -   "name": "closed_at",                              -   "data_type": "string",                              -   "scout_field_type": "Date",                              -   "custom_field": false                                           }                               },              -   {                  -   "id": "custom_field_1",                      -   "type": "event_fields",                      -   "attributes": {                          -   "name": "Custom field #1",                              -   "data_type": "string",                              -   "scout_field_type": "Short Text",                              -   "custom_field": true                                           }                               }                   ],      -   "links": { },      -   "meta": {          -   "count": 16                   }       }`

## [](#tag/event_supplier_companies)Event Supplier Companies

Use the event supplier companies API to manage event suppliers.

## [](#tag/event_supplier_companies/operation/Add Event Suppliers)Add Event Suppliers

Add suppliers to an event. Only events of type `RFP` are supported.

The operation will be rolled back upon any failure, and invitations won't be sent.

For best performance, we recommend inviting 10 or less suppliers in a single request.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

event\_id

required

integer

Example: 1

Event identifier.

##### Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json

data

Array of objects (SupplierCompany)

### Responses

**204**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

**404**

Not Found

post/events/{event\_id}/relationships/supplier\_companies

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/events/{event\_id}/relationships/supplier\_companies

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/events/{event\_id}/relationships/supplier\_companies

-   Payload
-   Curl

application/vnd.api+json

## [](#tag/event_supplier_companies/operation/Remove Event Suppliers)Remove Event Suppliers

Remove suppliers from an event. Only events of type `RFP` are supported.

The operation will be rolled back upon any failure, and invitations won't be removed.

For best performance, we recommend removing 10 or less suppliers in a single request.

## [](#tag/event_supplier_companies/operation/Add Event Suppliers using External IDs)Add Event Suppliers using External IDs

Add suppliers to an event. Only events of type `RFP` are supported.

You must supply the unique event external identifier (the one you used when created the event).

You must supply the external identifiers of the supplier companies too.

The operation will be rolled back upon any failure, and invitations won't be sent.

For best performance, we recommend inviting 10 or less suppliers in a single request.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

event\_external\_id

required

string

Example: EVENT1

Event external identifier.

##### Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json

data

Array of objects (ExternalSupplierCompany)

### Responses

**204**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

**404**

Not Found

post/events/{event\_external\_id}/relationships/supplier\_companies/external\_id

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/events/{event\_external\_id}/relationships/supplier\_companies/external\_id

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/events/{event\_external\_id}/relationships/supplier\_companies/external\_id

### Request samples

## [](#tag/event_supplier_contacts)Event Supplier Contacts

Use the event supplier contacts API to manage event suppliers. This API provides 2 advantages over the event supplier companies APIs:

-   It allows specifying the supplier contact to be associated/removed from an event.
-   It allows specifying multiple contacts for a given supplier.

## [](#tag/event_supplier_contacts/operation/Add Event Suppliers using Contacts)Add Event Suppliers using Contacts

Add suppliers to an event using supplier contacts. Only events of type `RFP` are supported.

For best performance, we recommend inviting 10 or less supplier contacts in a single request.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

event\_id

required

integer

Example: 1

Event identifier.

##### Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json

data

Array of objects (SupplierContact)

### Responses

**204**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

**404**

Not Found

## [](#tag/event_templates)Event Templates

Use the contract types API to query the event templates in Workday Strategic Sourcing.

Event Templates are used as a blueprint for newly created events.

## [](#tag/event_templates/Event-Template-Object)Event Template Object

type

required

string (EventTemplateType)

Object type, should always be `event_templates`.

id

required

integer (EventTemplateId)

Event template identifier string.

attributes

object (EventTemplateAttributes)

Event template attributes.

links

object (ResourceLinks)

List of related links.

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "type": "event_templates",      -   "id": 1,      -   "attributes": {          -   "title": "My Event Template",              -   "event_type": "RFP"                   },      -   "links": {          -   "self": "string"                   }       }`

## [](#tag/event_templates/operation/List Event Templates)List Event Templates

Returns a list of all event templates.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

### Responses

**200**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

get/event\_templates

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/event\_templates

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/event\_templates

### Request samples

-   Curl

Copy

curl \-H "X-Api-Key: ${COMPANY\_KEY}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Token: ${USER\_TOKEN}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Email: ${USER\_EMAIL}" \\
     \-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \\
     "https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/event\_templates"

### Response samples

-   200

Content type

application/vnd.api+json

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "meta": {          -   "count": 2                   },      -   "data": [          -   {                  -   "type": "event_templates",                      -   "id": "1",                      -   "attributes": {                          -   "title": "Event Template #1",                              -   "event_type": "RFP"                                           },                      -   "links": {                          -   "self": "[https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/event_templates/1](https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/event_templates/1)"                                           }                               },              -   {                  -   "type": "event_templates",                      -   "id": "2",                      -   "attributes": {                          -   "title": "Event Template #2",                              -   "event_type": "PERFORMANCE_REVIEW_EVENT"                                           },                      -   "links": {                          -   "self": "[https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/event_templates/2](https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/event_templates/2)"                                           }                               }                   ],      -   "links": {          -   "self": "[https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/event_templates](https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/event_templates)"                   }       }`

## [](#tag/worksheets)Worksheets

Use the worksheets API to create, update, and query the worksheets in Workday Strategic Sourcing.

type

required

string (WorksheetType)

Object type, should always be `worksheets`.

id

required

integer (WorksheetId)

Worksheet identifier string.

attributes

object (WorksheetAttributes)

Worksheet attributes.

links

object (ResourceLinks)

List of related links.

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

## [](#tag/worksheets/operation/Describe Worksheet object)Describe Worksheet object

Returns a list of fields for the worksheet object.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

### Responses

**200**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

## [](#tag/line_items)Line Items

Use the line items API to create, update, and query the worksheet line items in Workday Strategic Sourcing.

## [](#tag/line_items/Line-Item-Object)Line Item Object

type

required

string (LineItemType)

Object type, should always be `line_items`.

id

required

integer (LineItemId)

LineItem identifier string.

attributes

object (LineItemAttributes)

LineItem attributes.

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "type": "line_items",      -   "id": 1,      -   "attributes": {          -   "data": {                  -   "data_identifier": "string",                      -   "value1": null,                      -   "value2": null                               }                   }       }`

## [](#tag/line_items/operation/List Line Items)List Line Items

required

integer

Example: 1

Example: 1

## [](#tag/line_items/operation/Update a Line Item)Update a Line Item

Updates the details of an existing line item. You need to supply the unique line item that was returned upon line item creation.

Please note, that request body must include the `id` attribute with the value of your line item unique identifier (the same one you passed in the URL).

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

event\_id

required

integer

Example: 1

Event identifier.

worksheet\_id

required

integer

Example: 1

Worksheet identifier.

id

required

integer

Example: 1

Unique line item identifier.

##### Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json

data

object (LineItemUpdate)

### Responses

**200**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

**404**

Not Found

**409**

Conflict

patch/events/{event\_id}/worksheets/{worksheet\_id}/line\_items/{id}

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/events/{event\_id}/worksheets/{worksheet\_id}/line\_items/{id}

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/events/{event\_id}/worksheets/{worksheet\_id}/line\_items/{id}

### Request samples

-   Payload
-   Curl

Content type

application/vnd.api+json

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "data": {          -   "id": "1",              -   "type": "line_items",              -   "attributes": {                  -   "data": {                          -   "c1": "Painfully Amazing Product",                              -   "c2": 24,                              -   "c3": "items"                                           }                               },              -   "relationships": {                  -   "worksheet": {                          -   "data": {                                  -   "type": "worksheets",                                      -   "id": "1"                                                       }                                           }                               }                   }       }`

### Response samples

-   200
-   409

Content type

application/vnd.api+json

## [](#tag/bids)Bids

Use the bids API to query the bids in Workday Strategic Sourcing. Only bids for events of type `RFP` are supported.

## [](#tag/bids/Bid-Object)Bid Object

type

required

string (BidType)

Object type, should always be `bids`.

id

required

integer (BidId)

Bid identifier string.

attributes

object (BidAttributes)

Bid attributes.

relationships

object (BidRelationship)

Bid relationships.

links

object (ResourceLinks)

List of related links.

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "id": "1",      -   "type": "bids",      -   "attributes": {          -   "intend_to_bid": true,              -   "intend_to_bid_answered_at": "2020-01-02T03:04:05.000Z",              -   "status": "resubmitted",              -   "submitted_at": "2020-01-02T03:04:05.000Z",              -   "resubmitted_at": "2020-01-02T03:04:05.000Z"                   },      -   "relationships": {          -   "event": {                  -   "data": {                          -   "id": "1",                              -   "type": "events"                                           }                               },              -   "supplier_company": {                  -   "data": {                          -   "id": "1",                              -   "type": "supplier_companies"                                           }                               }                   },      -   "links": {          -   "self": "[https://api.scoutrfp.com/api/v3/bids/1](https://api.scoutrfp.com/api/v3/bids/1)"                   }       }`

## [](#tag/bids/operation/List Bids)List Bids

Returns a list of all bids. Only bids for events of type `RFP` are returned.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

event\_id

required

integer

Example: 1

Event identifier.

##### query Parameters

filter

object (BidInputFilter)

Filter bids by multiple criteria. Only one filter per attribute is supported. For best performance, we recommend 5 or less filters.

include

string (BidRelatedResources)

Enum: "event" "supplier\_company"

Use the `include` parameter to request related resources along with the primary resource.

page

object (PageInput)

Customize pagination results with `size`.

### Responses

**200**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

get/events/{event\_id}/bids

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/events/{event\_id}/bids

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/events/{event\_id}/bids

### Request samples

-   Curl

Copy

curl \-H "X-Api-Key: ${COMPANY\_KEY}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Token: ${USER\_TOKEN}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Email: ${USER\_EMAIL}" \\
     \-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \\
     "https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/events/1/bids"

## [](#tag/bid_line_items)Bid Line Items

Use the bid line items API to query the bid line items in Workday Strategic Sourcing.

## [](#tag/bid_line_items/Bid-Line-Item-Object)Bid Line Item Object

type

required

string (BidLineItemType)

Object type, should always be `bid_line_items`.

id

required

integer (BidLineItemId)

BidLineItem identifier string.

attributes

object (BidLineItemAttributes)

BidLineItem attributes.

relationships

object (BidLineItemRelationship)

Bid line item relationship.

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

## [](#tag/bid_line_items/operation/List All Bid Line Items)List All Bid Line Items

Returns a list of all bid line items.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### query Parameters

filter

object (BidLineItemInputFilter)

Filter bid line items by multiple criteria. Only one filter per attribute is supported. For best performance, we recommend 5 or less filters.

**200**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

## [](#tag/contact_types)Contact Types

Use the contact types API to create, update, and query the contact types in Workday Strategic Sourcing.

## [](#tag/contact_types/ContactType-Object)ContactType Object

type

required

string (ContactTypeType)

Object type, should always be `contact_types`.

id

required

integer (ContactTypeId)

Contact type identifier string.

attributes

object (ContactTypeAttributes)

Contact type attributes.

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "type": "contact_types",      -   "id": 1,      -   "attributes": {          -   "name": "Financials",              -   "external_id": "string"                   }       }`

## [](#tag/contact_types/operation/Update a Contact Type)Update a Contact Type

Updates the details of an existing contact type. You need to supply the unique identifier that was returned upon contact type creation.

Please note, that request body must include an `id` attribute with the value of your contact type unique identifier (the same one you passed in the URL).

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

id

required

integer

Example: 1

Unique contact type identifier.

##### Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json

data

object (ContactTypeUpdate)

### Responses

**200**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

**404**

Not Found

**409**

Conflict

patch/fields/contact\_types/{id}

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/fields/contact\_types/{id}

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/fields/contact\_types/{id}

### Request samples

-   Payload
-   Curl

Content type

application/vnd.api+json

Copy

### Response samples

-   200
-   409

Content type

application/vnd.api+json

Copy

## [](#tag/contact_types/operation/Update a Contact Type by External ID)Update a Contact Type by External ID

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

## [](#tag/field_groups)Field Groups

Use the fields API to create, update, and query the custom fields groups in Workday Strategic Sourcing. Custom field groups act as a collection of custom fields. Every newly made custom field with requires a custom field group (except for the fields with `target_object` set to `RFP`).

## [](#tag/field_groups/Field-Group-Object)Field Group Object

type

required

string (FieldGroupType)

Object type, should always be `field_groups`.

id

required

integer (FieldGroupId)

Field group identifier string.

attributes

object (FieldGroupAttributes)

Field group attributes.

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

`{  -   "type": "field_groups",      -   "id": 1,      -   "attributes": {          -   "target_object": "PROJECT",              -   "name": "string",              -   "position": 0                   }       }`

## [](#tag/field_groups/operation/List Field Groups)List Field Groups

Returns a list of field groups.

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

### Responses

**200**

OK

**401**

Unauthorized

Production Server

https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/field\_groups

Sandbox Server

https://api.sandbox.scoutrfp.com/v3/field\_groups

### Request samples

-   Curl

Copy

curl \-H "X-Api-Key: ${COMPANY\_KEY}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Token: ${USER\_TOKEN}" \\
     \-H "X-User-Email: ${USER\_EMAIL}" \\
     \-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \\
     "https://api.scoutrfp.com/v3/field\_groups"

### Response samples

-   200

Content type

application/vnd.api+json

Copy

Expand all Collapse all

## [](#tag/field_groups/operation/Update a Field Group)Update a Field Group

Updates the details of an existing field group. You need to supply the unique identifier that was returned upon field group creation.

Please note, that request body must include an `id` attribute with the value of your field unique identifier (the same one you passed in the URL).

##### Authorizations:

(_api\_key__user\_token__user\_email_)

##### path Parameters

id

required

integer

Example: 1

Unique Field Group identifier.

##### Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json

object (FieldGroupUpdate)
